Speaking

When not building Commsor, I spend much of my time talking about community, remote work, and Community-Led Growth. Whether you're looking for a podcast guest, event speaker, or someone to pitch the power of community internally to your team.

Bio: Mac Reddin is the founder and CEO of Commsor, the world's first full-stack community company, building the tools, education, and resources for the next generation of Community-Led Companies. As an active community builder for the past 10 years, he has built various communities across the gaming, tech, and fashion industries. Prior to starting Commsor, Mac founded The Chunk, a Minecraft gaming network that he bootstrapped to an exit in 2016.
